Dialogue: Don’t you work at the garden shop or something?
OH WAIT! YOU'RE THAT DETECTIVE! Right?!
I guess you can say that...
The short… and weren’t you yellow?
I know I've seen you before.
Wait, you're that Zangua guy from the newspaper? The one who investigates rumors.
Wait! That means you've been to tons of places right!
Uh…Yeah heh some interest and some not so much.
Were the environments all unique and interesting to study right?
Well I guess so when you put it that way. But I’m guessing you wanted to hear some of my investigations huh.
I wanna hear about the exotic plants you came across. What can you tell me about their features, like their roots,stems, petals or even the type of fruit they might produce?
